claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: A page showing the table of contents on the left margin and text describing CDC MMWR recommendations and editorial/production staff listings. No figures, data tables, or clinical findings are present. The image contains only administrative and editorial information and does not support the claim regarding recombinant technology and broader immune responses, therefore it does not support the claim. Note: The page is clearly administrative in nature with no relevant immunogenicity or vaccine response data.
